thread.section_title: PlantShed New York Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlantShed New York Flowers | plantshed.com
thread.title: Rachel
thread.title_full: PlantShed New York Flowers reviewed by Rachel

author: Rachel
title: Rachel
text: I live in Australia and wanted to send some flowers to my good friend who had just had her first baby in NYC. Plant Shed provided excellent service - clear images of the bouquet, easy payment and delivery instructions forms. Best of all were the email updates that confirmed my order had been received and delivered. Very happy!
